text.firstLine: We commission the world’s most renowned course architects to
text.secondLine: design spectacular golf experiences on challenging yet
text.thridLine: incredibly playable 18-hole courses. Our trademark comfort
text.fourthLine: stations also set new standards in on-course amenities.

footMenu.title: Company
footMenu.copyWright: © Discovery Land Company. All rights reserved.

para1: Our signature clubhouses and comfort stations make
every round of golf so much more than just a game –
giving you the opportunity to enjoy outstanding
amenities with every detail thought of and every taste
paragraph2: Take a well-earned breather and recharge in our
beautifully relaxed and inviting comfort stations. Admire
some of nature’s most breathtaking views while kicking
back with a refreshing drink and hearty snack during a
round. And if you’ve worked up an appetite for
something a little more substantial, you’ll also find
refined gourmet offerings from our on course chefs
ready and waiting to take your order.
paragraph3: Pick up some professional tips with a private lesson or
practice your game in our state-of-the-art facilities.

rightText.textTitle: Perfect recreation in an unmatched location
paragraphOne: Our widely-acclaimed courses have been designed by
some of the world’s very best architects, including.
Robert Trent Jones Jr. and Tom Fazio.
paragraphTwo: And it’s their genius way of transforming unique
landscapes into stunningly scenic courses that make
our golf experience as beautiful as it is playable.
paragraphThree: Every fairway rewards the perfect drive, every bunker
has been carefully placed, every pin position has been
meticulously planned – with all our courses thoughtfully
paragraphFour: So you can choose to take on your fellow members in
ultra-competitive annual tournaments, or just play for
the fun of it…barefoot with the family. This is luxury and
